answerText: ubiquitin[10] By targeting specific protein substrates, these enzymes attach ubiquitin to a lysine on the target protein. These enzymes do their job after the activating and conjugating enzymes have done theirs and they are divided into HECT and RING finger classes.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Northwestern A | 11 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This proteins is similar to SUMO. For 10 points each: [10] Small  chains of this molecule attach to a target protein and direct it to the proteasome for degradation.
